name: metroplex
description: Metroplex is capable of transforming into a battle station, giant robot or a distributed connect client directory for Primus.

scripts.coverage: istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --reporter spec --ui bdd test/*.test.js
scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --ui bdd test/*.test.js

author: Arnout Kazemier
